# pipefy_phase (Data Source)

Phase data source

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "pipefy_phase" "example" {
  id = "<PHASE_ID>"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The ID of the phase

### Read-Only

- `name` (String) Name of the phase
- `pipe_id` (String) The ID of the pipe that the phase belongs to
